attr.title: Minit
attr.desc: Minit is a peculiar little adventure played sixty seconds at a time. Journey outside the comfort of your home to help unusual folk, uncover countless secrets, and overcome dangerous foes, all in hopes of lifting a rather unfortunate curse that ends each day after just one minute.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from Steam. Copy data.win, all .ogg and all .csv files to /ports/minit/gamedata
